pli-tv-bu-vb-sk42:1.3.1: According to the sub-commentary, Sp-yoj 1.618, the whole hand refers to the five fingers: _pañcaṅguliṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ_, “It is said with regard to the five fingers.” The same point is made at Kkh-pt: _Sakalaṁ hatthanti sakalā aṅguliyo_, “The whole hand means all the fingers.”
